projects.title: PowerVisualize Portfolio Site
projects.description: Production React + Vite + Tailwind portfolio site demonstrating full-stack capability with interactive data visualizations and serverless API integration.

projects.title: A/B Testing Pipeline
projects.description: Production A/B testing pipeline producing Power BI-friendly CSV outputs with frequentist and Bayesian metrics, including GitHub Action workflow.

projects.title: NYC Flood Risk: Buildings vs Neighborhoods
projects.description: End-to-end geospatial engineering project merging three independent spatial datasets using polygon geometry joins. Spatial ETL performed in Python with PMTiles pipeline for cloud-hosted vector data.

projects.title: Lending Club Loan Data Analysis
projects.description: R-based repository for loan data analysis with statistical modeling and data science workflows.
